# include <iostream>
using namespace std;

bool isSubsetSum(const int a[], const int N, const int W){
 for(int bit = 0; bit < (1<<N); ++bit){
 int sum = 0;
 for(int i = 0; i < N; ++i){
 if(bit & (1<<i)) sum += a[i];
 }
 if(sum == W) return true;
 }
 return false;
}

int main(){
 const int N = 4, W = 19;
 const int a[] = {3,5,7,9};

 if(isSubsetSum(a,N,W)) cout << "Yes" << endl;
 else cout << "No" << endl;

 return 0;
}

 int min = v[0];

 }

}

int search(int t, int* x, int n){
 int lower, upper, middle;
 lower = 0;
 upper = n01;
 while(lower <= upper){
 middle = (lower + upper) /2;
 if(x[middle] < t)
 lower = middle; //(1)
 else if (t < x[middle])
 upper = middle; //(2)
 else
 return middle;
 }
 return -1;
}

void shift(int i, int* x, int n){
 int parent, child, temp;
 parent = i;
 child = 2*parent + 1;
 while(child < n){
 if(x[child] < x[parent]){
 temp = x[child];
 x[child] = x[parent];
 x[parent] = temp;
 parent = child;
 child = 2*parent + 1;
 }else{
 break;
 }
 }
}

 if(child+1<n)if(x[child] > x[child + 1])child ++;
 if(x[child] < x[parent]){

 x[child] = x[parent];
 x[parent] = temp;
 parent = child;
 child = 2*parent + 1;
 }else{
 break;
 }
 }
}

int f_a(int N){
 int count = 1;

 for(int i = 3; i <= N; i+=2){
 for (int j = 3; j<=i; j+=2){
 if(i==j)++count;
 if(i%j==0)break;
 }
 }
}

int f_b(int N){
 if(N<=1)return N;
 else return f_b(N-1)+f_b(N-2);
}

int f_c(int N){
 return (N+7)>>3<<3;
}

int fa(int N){
 int i,j,kcount;

 count = 0;
 for(i=1;i<=N;i++){
 for(j=1;j<=N;j++){
 for(k=1;k<=N;k++){
 count=count+1;
 }
 }
 }
 return count;
}

int fb(int N){
 int count;
 if(N==0)return 1;
 else{
 count = fb(N-1) + fb(N-1);
 return count;
 }
}

int fc(int N){
 int i,j,count;

 count = 0;
 for(i=1;i<=N;i++){
 for(j=1;j<=N;j++){
 count=count+1;
 }
 if(i%2==1){
 count=count+1;
 }
 }
 return count;
}

int fd(int N){
 int i,j,count;

 count=0;
 i=1;
 while(i<=N){
 count = count +1;
 j = 1;
 while(j<=N){
 count=count+1;
 j=j*2;
 }
 i++;
 }
 return count;
}

void selectSort(void){
 int i,j,min;
 for(i=0;i<N-1;i++){
 min=i;
 for(j=i+1;j<N;j++){
 if( data[min] > data[j] ){
 min=j;
 }
 }
 swap(i,min);
 }
}

void swap(int x,int y){
 int tmp;
 tmp=data[x];
 data[x]=data[y];
 data[y]=tmp;
}
